item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2018
item.description: Hammond’s Gourmet Ice Cream It was fun visiting San Diego for DjangoCon US 2018. I gave my talk Don’t Be a Robot; Build the Bot. I think it was well received ðŸ˜Š This was also a special travel trip, because, well it happens that my husband also needed to travel for work at the same time, so we don’t have anyone to look after our two kids. I ended up taking my kids with me to the conference.
